_GEng_Anim_FrameCount.documentation: Get the number of frames in an Animation Object
_GEng_Anim_FrameCount.label: _GEng_Anim_FrameCount(ByRef $hAnim)

_GEng_Anim_FrameAdd.documentation: Add a frame to an Animation Object
_GEng_Anim_FrameAdd.label: _GEng_Anim_FrameAdd(ByRef $hAnim, ByRef $hImage, $iFramDuration, $x = Default, $y = Default, $w = Default, $h = Default)

params.label: $x
params.documentation:
Top left corner position of the rectangle.
	Use the parameter to specify the rectangle of the Image Object to assign to the frame

params.label: $y
params.documentation:
Top left corner position of the rectangle.
	Use the parameter to specify the rectangle of the Image Object to assign to the frame

params.label: $w
params.documentation:
Size of the rectangle.
	Use the parameter to specify the rectangle of the Image Object to assign to the frame

params.label: $h
params.documentation:
Size of the rectangle.
	Use the parameter to specify the rectangle of the Image Object to assign to the frame

_GEng_Anim_FrameMod.label: _GEng_Anim_FrameMod(ByRef $hAnim, $iFrameNumber, ByRef $hImage, $iFramDuration = Default, $x = Default, $y = Default, $w = Default, $h = Default)

params.label: $iFrameNumber
params.documentation: 1-based index of the frame to modify

params.label: $x
params.documentation:
Top left corner position of the rectangle.
	Use the parameter to specify the rectangle of the Image Object to assign to the frame

params.label: $y
params.documentation:
Top left corner position of the rectangle.
	Use the parameter to specify the rectangle of the Image Object to assign to the frame

params.label: $w
params.documentation:
Size of the rectangle.
	Use the parameter to specify the rectangle of the Image Object to assign to the frame

params.label: $h
params.documentation:
Size of the rectangle.
	Use the parameter to specify the rectangle of the Image Object to assign to the frame
